name: ucfr-desktop
description: Scaffolded Electron + React desktop app with mocked authentication and API flows.

scripts.build:preload: tsc src/preload/index.ts --outDir dist/preload --module commonjs --target ES2020 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --declaration false
scripts.watch:preload: tsc src/preload/index.ts --outDir dist/preload --module commonjs --target ES2020 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --declaration false --watch
scripts.dev: yarn build:preload && concurrently -k "yarn watch:preload" "vite --host" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && nodemon --watch src/main --watch dist/preload --exec 'electron electron-main.js'"
